metadata.name: CredUI.DLL Loaded By Uncommon Process
metadata.comment: Detects loading of "credui.dll" and related DLLs by an uncommon process. Attackers might leverage this DLL for potential use of "CredUIPromptForCredentials" or "CredUnPackAuthenticationBufferW".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((endswith(lower(module.file.path), lower('\\\\credui.dll')) OR endswith(lower(module.file.path), lower('\\\\wincredui.dll'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('credui\\.dll', 'wincredui\\.dll')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\')) OR lower(LOWER(process.name)) in ('c:\\\\windows\\\\explorer\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\immersivecontrolpanel\\\\systemsettings\\.exe', 'c:\\\\windows\\\\regedit\\.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\opera_autoupdate.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\procexp64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\procexp.exe')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\microsoft\\\\teams\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\teams.exe')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\microsoft\\\\onedrive\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects loading of "credui.dll" and related DLLs by an uncommon process. Attackers might leverage this DLL for potential use of "CredUIPromptForCredentials" or "CredUnPackAuthenticationBufferW".

metadata.objective: False positive: Other legitimate processes loading those DLLs in your environment. References: https://securitydatasets.com/notebooks/atomic/windows/credential_access/SDWIN-201020013208.html, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1056.002/T1056.002.md#atomic-test-2---powershell---prompt-user-for-password, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/wincred/nf-wincred-creduipromptforcredentialsa, https://github.com/S12cybersecurity/RDPCredentialStealer
